name: MV Pass
description:
This is your gateway to forging unforgettable experiences and be part of an insider of the media & entertainment world. 

MV Pass is a digital membership pass that allows you to unlock exclusive experiences in the media & entertainment scene, such as closed-door movie premieres, meet & greet sessions, backstage passes, opportunities to participate in the process of making a film and many more. 

Anyone and everyone can join Metaviva as a MVP member! Get your hands on one of our MV Passes today.
